name: Loading Cannons...
description:
Loading Cannons... is the first game I have ever made and published onto any sites so I hope you enjoy!

This game is a very literal version of 'tower defense' where you will be faced with defending a tower against the oncoming hordes with only an infinite supply of cannonballs and a very manual cannon. Currently, there are 10 waves with a boss at the end however I intend to add more as time goes on.

Plans for the future:

  • More power ups
  • More enemies and bosses
  • More upgrades
  • Achievements

For more information on the game you can head over to my YouTube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_G9V_3d-Uz7V2z8ptQ3VjA
